<div data-page="{"component":"ycdc_new/pages/Companies/ShowPage","props":{"currentUser":null,"company":{"id":28069,"slug":"pylon-2","name":"Pylon","batch_name":"W23","small_logo_url":"https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/412a6b3ef532664df77532bc5d7ae3c1233de965.png","one_liner":"Customer support platform, built for B2B.","website":"https://usepylon.com/?utm_source=ycdirectory&utm_medium=yc","long_description":"Pylon is a modern alternative to Zendesk. Pylon helps B2B companies manage their customers across the different places they talk to them - shared Slack channels, Microsoft Teams, email, in-app chat, Slack communities, and more.

Hundreds of fast-growing YC companies of all sizes like Mintlify, Hightouch, and Deel use Pylon to track customer conversations across slack/teams/email/in-app/community, resolve customer issues quickly, and keep customers engaged.

Pylon replaces tools like Zendesk/Intercom for modern companies.

Learn more: https://www.usepylon.com


-------
Examples of specific capabilities include:
- Unify customer conversations across Slack, Microsoft Teams, In-App Chat, Email, and Community.
- Triage open issues, set SLAs, prioritize questions based on customer tier or other CRM data, connect questions with engineering work in Linear/Jira/Github, and measure metrics like response time and resolution rate.
- Broadcast product updates, upcoming events, or outages to 100s of channels at once and get live link click, reaction, and reply data.","tags":["b2b","customer-success","customer-support","ai"],"ycdc_status":"Active","logo_url":"https://bookface-images.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/logos/1a9690e8b8b1a3f2d8331e0ec28282de4aef8008.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAQC4NIECAGM37YI7L%2F20241009%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20241009T182128Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEAoaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQDY%2B%2BBg5NRkvOVkuVGZ%2BOUtmYfBPex82kdv3MgfuhDWQAIhANFPW9co7PpMsY%2FszIAJRCDNLCJJQwMFY%2BLz8%2FKvNzyEKuUDCGMQABoMMDA2MjAxODExMDcyIgykqgN76%2FD8wfcyrq8qwgNtf1czDDG2WVT2jr0N22meiMYsIcNWFI7JYE8ZU5SvS28ycpYXcULz0bgKC9zKKoFlAsfrbvr%2BtqXxQ41MfF%2BX%2FoYIydjTCgZpDlf8GBNWrbICdtuGzXbKLNYfFv8M5jBOPB6PvaBPg%2Be2PGOTBggAA7jT%2FaEb%2BpKNOiyIUuj2p7qNZ91q3afBkn%2B3gu1LEJL%2FnCtxsozbYpvYfHQtQRlMvHQbB85yB1saPeqeZB8IuqjZnHixXlTWjUBtt5Clx%2F6UYj0VC0bJZcnY1S5M7uGoYKBp8iR41C5CCKYti7FCsm23CD5b7XRjSRpz9TZn5O%2FR2SX9ssyEA6ftXItslMcDY7%2FbLkcnUUknL9Sm6Q8G67GUa0A9LxYuPWvGN5XZtfWQvmX%2Boc8RBMr1ejxXg30FTvVQtUH%2BAwOTUAdRyswhxPlLJ6yr0wMsWx1BgdMrqJ9tFPowVxwsRCrYKxY%2BVFjv%2FoH%2FJs7MTLOk4CG79S3PNuajDnO4GhHYUvm5FYDCnnqVNb7q81zYw4deO71GvlqbY1pP7ohEfeGTUw%2FqrKUJh2tlJ6OpATeVNku3knhSoEucDWD%2FcpAeWjx0gn0h4lWk98AwwIebuAY6pAGLoe8p1zy1O%2BD5XcZxODlqXNbbjgbGMCPlkF7IDW3DjoLqbriDYMbgNHYjAFRMh%2F%2BOLbJewCKKO8mD5u9GnnYYTq2vDxuT0f7O%2BR%2FT8CKsPZMYLwDb6pNrceG3%2FUmeexKTFtLls0ziHiAaZcioh9CCOyi9%2F2Wg4JZVQ%2BTxsA5PBGXEDZ0xmnMvJMYv4906ZuA5mGxwXI6VX2Y%2BpPQo%2Fj%2BsneY36A%3D%3D&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&X-Amz-Signature=a679ac6bdcffe36c97b6699fd90135e1e99d28f4c38c07078fedc63c683ecd57","year_founded":2022,"team_size":15,"location":"San
